K10D0236_H0237:412a-1: bha ga w'a na aushni sha ma h'a /

K10D0236_H0237:443b-1: skyabs mi byed pa'i rgyas par gsal ba'i sa bon

K10D0236_H0237:443b-11: pho theg can gyi skye bo rnams bslad pas rang gi nyams drod ma zin te /

K10D0236_H0237:443b-15: yin no snyam du sems shing bla na med pa'i

K10D0236_H0237:444a-6: phra mo snyed kyang chos kyi sgo 'di bzhin du

K10D0236_H0237:444a-8: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zad na khyed kyis
K10D0236_H0237:444a-9: mngon sum du dbang po thams cad 'khrul bar spyad
K10D0236_H0237:444a-10: pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rdo

K10D0236_H0237:444a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sa bcu sbyong ba

K10D0236_H0237:444b-2: khyed kyi sems kyis shes par byas nas dri ma

K10D0236_H0237:445a-18: dag ste skye shi la mi gnas na /

K10D0236_H0237:445b-5: yong nas yod pa kun ni /

K10D0236_H0237:445b-15: bshad do // pa yin te / smos / de'i
K10D0236_H0237:445b-16: phyir de bzhin gshegs pas khyed kyi phyir sgron mar

K10D0236_H0237:447b-1: / skye shi la zab tu skye zhing khams gsum

K10D0236_H0237:447b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad ni /
K10D0236_H0237:447b-26: mi la la zhig gis lus kyi phas pham pa bzhi dang /
K10D0236_H0237:447b-27: phas pham pa bcu ldan par byas nas dbugs gang tsam la khams 'di dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448a-0: @448a *// khams gzhan gyi mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448a-1: phyogs bcu ma lus pa na mtshams med pa'i sems
K10D0236_H0237:448a-2: can dmyal bar ma phyin pa med do; ;se gel
K10D0236_H0237:448a-3: thabs gcig gtogs pa'i srid gcig chos kyi sgo 'di
K10D0236_H0237:448a-4: khyer te phyi ma'i bskal ba tha ma'i tshe ma
K10D0236_H0237:448a-6: mi de'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig sems kyi
K10D0236_H0237:448a-7: skad cig tsam gyi bar du tshangs shing 'byung ste
K10D0236_H0237:448a-8: / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las
K10D0236_H0237:448a-9: thar nas bde ba'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur te
K10D0236_H0237:448a-11: snga ma'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i cha dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448a-16: dpe'i bar du bsgrun du med do; ;dga' bo /
K10D0236_H0237:448a-17: sems can la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di kha
K10D0236_H0237:448a-18: ton du 'don cing sngags 'di gzungs su bzung na
K10D0236_H0237:448a-19: / bskal ba mi zad pa'i bar du yang ngas
K10D0236_H0237:448a-20: bshad par mi nus so; ;khyed rnams ngas bshad pa'i
K10D0236_H0237:448a-22: byang chub grub kyi bar du bdud kyi lam las thar ro //
K10D0236_H0237:448a-23: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448a-28: 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @448b dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-1: theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-2: drang srong gi bu gtsang ma dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-3: thog ma sems bskyed pa'i mthu bo che dang /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-4: yi dvags rnams shin tu dga' zhing mgu nas phyag btsal te so sor dong ngo //
K10D0236_H0237:448b-5: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsag tor chen po'i le'u stong phrag bcu pa las /
K10D0236_H0237:448b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0236_H0237:448b-7: thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa don mngon par thob par
